title: (SKCanvasView) Clear with Transparent does not work on XF/iOS. (also set Background as Transparent)
body:
Hi Matthew. 

I alway want to say thanks to you and SkiaSharp. 
It helped us a lot. 

I have a problem to clear SKCanvasView with Transparent color on XF/iOS.
It's working correctly on XF/Android.
I'm using Skiasharp.forms. 
And I also set SKCanvasView's background color as Transparent.

I wonder if you could quick fix for this?

Thanks.
